function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to lack of social distancing","Impact":"Increased transmission of diseases and risk of outbreaks","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, promotion of telework, and investment in public health infrastructure","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, remote work technology, and public health surveillance systems","People":"General population, workers in essential businesses, and residents of densely populated areas","Owner":"Government, public health agencies, and employers"},{"Description":"Economic costs to businesses and people due to social distancing measures","Impact":"Job losses, reduced hours and incomes, food and housing insecurity, and permanently closed businesses","Mitigation":"Financial support for affected businesses and individuals, investment in social welfare programs, and temporary relief measures","Technologies":"Online financial assistance platforms, remote work technology, and virtual communication tools","People":"Business owners, employees, and individuals affected by job losses","Owner":"Government, financial institutions, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Shift in living preferences leading to depopulation of large cities","Impact":"Decreased demand for real estate, decline in property values, and economic challenges for urban areas","Mitigation":"Promotion of urban revitalization projects, investment in affordable housing, and creation of incentives to attract residents to urban areas","Technologies":"Digital marketing platforms, urban planning software, and remote property viewing tools","People":"Real estate developers, urban planners, and residents of urban areas","Owner":"Government, city authorities, and private developers"}]}
